alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN KENTON, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL AND NORTHWESTERN PENDLETON COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Butler, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Claryville, Butler, Visalia, Greenwood, Grants Lick, Aspen Grove, Morning View, Peach Grove, White Villa, Ivor, Campbell County Lake, Gene Snyder Airport, and Fiskburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
